page.title: 20MEMBERS OF THE GROUP
page.content:
The following schools have jointly produced the work on this disc.
Markland Hill C.P. Squares 1 and 5 Church Road C.P. Square 2 St Thomas(Halliwell)C of E. Primary Square 3 Chalfont C.P. Square 4 (Coordinating School) St Thomas of Canterbury R.C.Primary Square 6 Gaskell C.P. Square 7 Bolton School(Girls Division) Squares 8 and 12 Mount St.Joseph School Squares 9 and 10 Gilnow C.P. Square 11
The above schools would like to thank all those who have helped them compile this information.
